Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Authorizes private membership establishments to have certain licenses for sale of alcohol
Summary: Authorizes private membership establishments to have certain licenses for sale of alcohol for consumption on premises; establishes a private membership establishment must include one hundred or more members.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the alcoholic beverage control law, in relation to authorizing private membership establishments to have certain licenses for sale of alcohol
